Text: Expedition Robinson 2005: The major twist this season was that the contestants were divided into tribes based on their annual salaries, with the North team being the "rich" team and the South team being the "poor" team.
Triplets:<Expedition Robinson 2005
2:
--------------------
Text: Expedition Robinson 2005:  Another twist was that of the change in voting format, each contestants were given thirteen votes that they could use at any time and in any amount.

Text: Expedition Robinson 2005:  Both were "jokers" and did not enter the competition until episode 3.

<Expedition Robinson 2005

--------------------
Text: Expedition Robinson 2005:  If challenged, the chief and challenger would face off in a duel in which the winner would become chief and the loser would be eliminated from the competition.
Triplets:<Expedition Robinson 2005
7:
--------------------
Text: Expedition Robinson 2005:  The final twist of the season was that of the "Finalist Island".

--------------------
Text: Expedition Robinson 2005: The two contestants left on Finalist Island when only seven contestants were left would have immunity until the final four, while the remaining five contestants not on the island would have to compete for the two remaining spots.

<Text: Expedition Robinson 2005:  Karolina and Max were the last two contestants on Finalist Island.>
